meanings.definition: The process of breaking up into small parts or fragments.
meanings.sent1: After the explosion, the disintegrations of the building were scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the disintegrations of the old bridge caused it to collapse.
meanings.sent3: The disintegrations of the cake made it look like a delicious mess.
meanings.sent4: The disintegrations of trust in their relationship slowly tore them apart.
meanings.sent5: The disintegrations of the sandcastle left a trail of tiny grains behind.

meanings.definition: The act or process of falling apart or collapsing.
meanings.sent1: The disintegrations of the old chair made it unsafe to sit on.
meanings.sent2: The disintegrations of the company led to its eventual closure.
meanings.sent3: The disintegrations of the jenga tower brought laughter to the room.
meanings.sent4: The disintegrations of the team's defense cost them the game.
meanings.sent5: The disintegrations of the ice sculpture created a beautiful mess on the floor.

meanings.definition: The state of decay or deterioration.
meanings.sent1: The disintegrations of the ancient parchment made it fragile to touch.
meanings.sent2: The disintegrations of the once vibrant painting saddened the art lovers.
meanings.sent3: The disintegrations of the old book gave it a unique vintage smell.
meanings.sent4: The disintegrations of the fallen leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent5: The disintegrations of the wooden fence revealed its age and wear.
